titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Jane White Papers, 1952-2013 RL.10179
titlestmt.author: Janice Hansen, Meghan Lyon

publicationstmt.publisher: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2015-07-29 18:45:40 -0400.

repository.corpname: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

did.abstract: This collection contains the medical documents of Jane White. It includes her medical record, insurance documents, and other miscellaneous documents.
did.physloc: For current information on the location of these materials, please consult the Library's online catalog.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Processed by: Janice Hansen, Meghan Lyon, November 2014
Accessions described in this finding aid: 2014-0188

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Researchers must register and agree to copyright and privacy laws before using this collection.
All or portions of this collection may be housed off-site in Duke University's Library Service Center. The library may require up to 48-hours to retrieve these materials for research use.
Please contact Research Services staff before visiting the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library to use this collection.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Jane White was born June 12, 1926. She died in 2013.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: The medical records of Jane White span the time period of 1952-2013. They detail a number of medical issues, including miscarriages, infertility, and gynecological care. Also included are a number of insurance documents, letters of recommendation for adoption, and miscellaneous medical documents.

acqinfo.head: Provenance
acqinfo.p: The Jane White Papers were received by the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library as a gift in 2014.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have not been transferred to Duke University. For more information, consult the copyright section of the Regulations and Procedures of the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Jane White Papers, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: These documents form the medical record of Jane White from 1952-2013. They include physician notes, lab results, requests for lab work, corresponce from physicians, hospital reports, and other relevant medical documents. The medical issues addressed include miscarriage, infertility, biopsies of breast lumps, and gall bladder issues, among others.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes insurance information, claims, bills and other documents.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Two letters and relevant documents requesting the donation of Jane White's eyes upon her death.
